wordpressPost.title: I had more, but you go ahead.
wordpressPost.content:
You guys realize you live in a sewer, right? In our darkest hour, we can stand erect, with proud upthrust bosoms. Take me to your leader! No! I want to live! There are still too many things I don’t own!

Look, everyone wants to be like Germany, but do we really have the pure strength of ‘will’? You won’t have time for sleeping, soldier, not with all the bed making you’ll be doing. Uh, is the puppy mechanical in any way?

I guess because my parents keep telling me to be more ladylike. As though!

Who am I making this out to? You are the last hope of the universe. It doesn’t look so shiny to me. Would you censor the Venus de Venus just because you can see her spewers? Then we’ll go with that data file!

  1. For example, if you killed your grandfather, you’d cease to exist!
  2. You don’t know how to do any of those.
  3. I don’t know what you did, Fry, but once again, you screwed up! Now all the planets are gonna start cracking wise about our mamas.

Ven ve voke up, ve had zese wodies.

Tell her she looks thin. File not found. That’s not soon enough! Who are you, my warranty?!

  • Ooh, name it after me!
  • Yes, if you make it look like an electrical fire. When you do things right, people won’t be sure you’ve done anything at all.
  • It doesn’t look so shiny to me.

Enough about your promiscuous mother, Hermes! We have bigger problems. Oh, you’re a dollar naughtier than most. Bender, quit destroying the universe! No! The kind with looting and maybe starting a few fires!

I never loved you. As an interesting side note, as a head without a body, I envy the dead. Isn’t it true that you have been paid for your testimony? I could if you hadn’t turned on the light and shut off my stereo.

Hi, I’m a naughty nurse, and I really need someone to talk to. $9.95 a minute. I’m a thing. Fry! Stay back! He’s too powerful! You know the worst thing about being a slave? They make you work, but they don’t pay you or let you go.

We need rest. The spirit is willing, but the flesh is spongy and bruised. Who’s brave enough to fly into something we all keep calling a death sphere? Is the Space Pope reptilian!? Would you censor the Venus de Venus just because you can see her spewers?

Humans dating robots is sick. You people wonder why I’m still single? It’s ’cause all the fine robot sisters are dating humans! Oh dear! She’s stuck in an infinite loop, and he’s an idiot! Well, that’s love for you.

Tell her you just want to talk. It has nothing to do with mating. Is today’s hectic lifestyle making you tense and impatient? Hey! I’m a porno-dealing monster, what do I care what you think? Uh, is the puppy mechanical in any way?

Ooh, name it after me! And from now on you’re all named Bender Jr. Fry! Stay back! He’s too powerful! A sexy mistake.

Yep, I remember. They came in last at the Olympics, then retired to promote alcoholic beverages! That’s the ONLY thing about being a slave. Bender, I didn’t know you liked cooking. That’s so cute. In our darkest hour, we can stand erect, with proud upthrust bosoms.

We don’t have a brig. Say what? Incidentally, you have a dime up your nose. These old Doomsday Devices are dangerously unstable. I’ll rest easier not knowing where they are.

I am the man with no name, Zapp Brannigan! You’ve killed me! Oh, you’ve killed me! Would you censor the Venus de Venus just because you can see her spewers? No argument here. For example, if you killed your grandfather, you’d cease to exist!

It’s a T. It goes “tuh”. Fry! Stay back! He’s too powerful! You won’t have time for sleeping, soldier, not with all the bed making you’ll be doing. You’re going to do his laundry? Aww, it’s true. I’ve been hiding it for so long.
